item.title: 【BLU-RAY】BLU-RAY - Motley Crue - The End Live in Los Angeles (2024) 4K UHD-BD
item.description:

Screenshots:


Setlist:
01 - Girls, Girls, Girls

04 - Same Ol' Situation (S.O.S.)
05 - Don't Go Away Mad (Just Go Away)
06 - Rock N Roll Part II / Smokin' In The Boys Room

10 - Louder Than Hell

12 - Guitar Solo

15 - T.N.T. (Terror 'N Tinseltown) / Dr. Feelgood
16 - Kickstart My Heart
17 - Home Sweet Home

Bonus Features
- Interviews With Motley Crue
- Nikki's Flamethrower Bass
- Tommy's Drum Rig

Abpout: Mercury Studios is preparing a 4K Blu-ray release of Mötley Crüe: The End - Live in Los Angeles. The release is scheduled to arrive on the market on April 22.
On December 31, 2015, before a sold-out Staples Center arena in Los Angeles, Mötley Crüe bid their final farewell. Their 35-year career as a band ended with a spectacular New Year’s Eve performance in their hometown, just a few miles from where it all started on the Sunset Strip.
